name: bug
description: This issue is a bug report.

name: closable
description: This issue has been marked by a contributor as an issue that can be closed by the repository maintainers.

name: Discussion Needed
description: This issue or PR needs to be reviewed by the OSCAL development team.

name: duplicate
description: This issue duplicates another issue.

name: enhancement
description: This issue adds a new feature, capability, or artifact to the repository.

name: Epic
description: This issue represents a collection of issues to be worked on over a series of sprints

name: help wanted
description: The NIST OSCAL team needs help from the community with this issue.

name: invalid
description: This issue is not resolvable in any way.

name: LoE: Large
description: This issue will require more than 20 hours to address. These issues should be broken down into smaller projects.

name: LoE: Medium
description: This issue will require more than 8 hours and up to 20 hours to address.

name: LoE: Small
description: This issue will require up to 8 hours to address.

name: ongoing effort
description: This issue represents a long-term task that has no end or acceptance criteria.

name: question
description: This issue contains a question that needs to be answered.

name: Scope: CI/CD
description: This issue is a task related to this repository's continuous integration and continuous deployment capability.

name: Scope: Content
description: This issue is a task related to development or maintenance of OSCAL content and examples.

name: Scope: Documentation
description: This issue is a task related to development or maintenance of OSCAL documentation.

name: Scope: Modeling
description: This issue is a task related to creating and maintaining OSCAL models and their related formats.

name: Scope: Metaschema
description: This issue is a task related to development and maitence of the Metaschema modeling framework and toolchain

name: Scope: Repository
description: This issue is a task related to maintenance and configuration of this repository.

name: Scope: Tooling and APIs
description: This issue is a task related to development of tooling and APIs to support OSCAL content creation and use.

name: Scope: Website
description: This issue is a task related to

name: User Story
description: This issue is a user story for a development task.

name: Waiting for Action
description: This issue is waiting for the assignee to take some action described in the issue's comments.

name: wontfix
description: This issue will not be addressed.
